name: incident-section-on-map-features-panel;issue-lt-4a-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt26-site-navigation-lt-4-map-operation-drawer-and-toggle-features-capability-lt-26-site-navigation

tags.name: LT 26 Site Navigation/LT-4 Map Operation Drawer and toggle features

title: Incident section on map features panel

userStory.storyName: LT-4 Map Operation Drawer and toggle features

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website

Then I should see below incident icons in the All type filter section
| Icon_Name |
| Crash |
| Breakdown |
| General Hazards |
| Traffic signals |
| Roadworks |
| Low impact roadworks |
| Changed Traffic Conditions |
| Public events |
| Fire |
| Flood |
| Snow/Ice |
| Adverse Weather |
When I unselect all incident type icons
Then I see no green tick in the incident type icons
Then I should be able to select "Crash" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Crash" incident
Then I should be able to select "Breakdown" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Breakdown" incident
Then I should be able to select "General Hazards" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "General Hazards" incident
Then I should be able to select "Traffic signals" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Traffic signals" incident
Then I should be able to select "Roadworks" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Roadworks" incident
Then I should be able to select "Low impact roadworks" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Low impact roadworks" incident
Then I should be able to select "Changed Traffic Conditions" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Changed Traffic Conditions" incident
Then I should be able to select "Public events" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Public events" incident
Then I should be able to select "Fire" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Fire" incident
Then I should be able to select "Flood" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Flood" incident
Then I should be able to select "Snow/Ice" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Snow/Ice" incident
Then I should be able to select "Adverse Weather" incident icon and verify incident count
Then I should be able to unselect "Adverse Weather" incident
